title: “ Yadoo” A Feature Film, Directed By Mehdi Jafari Kanoon

sources.title: “ Yadoo” A Feature Film, Directed By Mehdi Jafari Kanoon
sources.description: “ Yadoo” A Feature Film, Directed By Mehdi Jafari Kanoon “Yadoo” that has pictured the first months of the imposed war in Abadan is nominated for the best field special effects, the best make up, the best set designing, the best sound recordist, the best dubbing, the best original score, the best editing, the best cinematography, the best male lead actor, the best female lead actor, the best adapted screenplay, the best director and the best film.   “Yadoo” is the joint production by Kanoon Cinematic Affairs and Farabi Cinema Foundation. (kanoonnews.ir)
